pullrequest.title: Part 5: BulletDoublePendulum, PID control using bullet (rebranched)

content.raw:
from @JChoclin:

Looks ok. The plot of the errors: 

![plot of errors](https://bitbucket-assetroot.s3.amazonaws.com/repository/5q9rMzd/1049669840-plot1.png?Signature=toF0GcvZWHr%2BE1bivXUVgYst%2Bjo%3D&Expires=1521839937&AWSAccessKeyId=AKIAIQWXW6WLXMB5QZAQ&versionId=w1GmmEsbqzbl1mIzH8_CAazRs1qu.18E)

Tests coverage, code-check outputs, all that is the same than the previous pull request #12.

I would change and group the examples in a separated folder, like `examples/double-pendulum`. BulletMathConversions.hh should be in `include/ignition/physics/conversions` or similar in my opinion.
content.html:
from @JChoclin:

Looks ok. The plot of the errors:

Tests coverage, code-check outputs, all that is the same than the previous pull request #12.

I would change and group the examples in a separated folder, like examples/double-pendulum. BulletMathConversions.hh should be in include/ignition/physics/conversions or similar in my opinion.
